name: cellphone
long: A cell phone with a locked screen. Text message notifications keep popping up.
featureFalse: There are many text messages you better find the owner.
havenot: You don't have a cell phone.
take: You take the cell phone because it may be useful later.
drop: You drop the cell phone. I hope it didn't break!
available: There is a cell phone here.
unavailable: You don't see a cell phone here to take.
